text:
@thegoodgodabove @buffyblueny He NEVER called the virus a hoax, you idiot. He was referring to the liberal propaganda surrounding it. Stop peddling this bullshit. Why aren't you critical of Bill De Blasio. After all, NYC has been hit the hardest. Why weren't they prepared?
